name: gmail-compose
description: Compose and send Gmail emails via the web interface
author: cyclop-team
steps: Wait for compose window to appear
Tab order: To → CC → Subject → Body (press Tab between each field — TWO separate press_key Tab calls to get from To to Subject)
NEVER click field coordinates — use Tab navigation only
NEVER press Escape inside compose window — it closes the window, use Tab instead
After filling all fields, click the Send button (blue button at bottom-left of compose window)
